page.title: 20OUR DOMESDAY TAPESTRY
page.content: When we were finding out about Will- iam The Conqueror and the original Domesday Book we looked at pictures of the Bayeux Tapestry.One teacher said as a joke that we ought to make one ourselves.We decided to go ahead with the suggestion.We used the information and sketches from our Domesday project research and worked out the subjects. We worked in thirteen groups of four & made a panel each.Each panel shows a fomous landmark in Maldon.We had to plan it carefully.We sewed the back- ground on first using an electric sew- ing machine.We built up our pictures using different kinds of materials.We all worked hard on our tapestry and we are all very proud of it.It is hanging in the entrance of our school,Maldon County Primary and is now part of our memories of 1985.
